ModMetaData.name: Rimefeller Compat Patch
ModMetaData.author: KahirDragoon
ModMetaData.description:
Automatically patches all by chemfuel refuellable Things to be compatible with Rimefeller
Patches added for - Bioreactor - VFE Mechanoids - VFE Ancients
Safe to add midgame. Removal will result in harmless one time erros.
